summary: A crippled and embittered doctor travels to a hidden community in Tibet where he learns of his true destiny as the Sorcerer Supreme of his world.
cast: Bryce Johnson|Paul Nakauchi|Kevin Michael Richardson|Michael Yama|Susan Spano|Jonathan Adams|Fred Tatasciore|Tara Strong|Josh Keaton|Phil LaMarr|Masasa Moyo
director: Directors: Patrick Archibald, Frank Paur (as Frank D. Paur) | 1 more credit »
title: Doctor Extraño: Hechicero supremo
